itunes:title: Episode 615 - Don't Defund The Police
title: Episode 615 - Don't Defund The Police
itunes:author: Tetherball Academy Media
itunes:subtitle: Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway hold an emergency episode regarding the nationwide push to defund the police, Dan explains why the news has become exhausting, the democrats wear kente garb on Capitol Hill in remembrance of George Floyd, Reebok and a host...
itunes:summary:
Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway hold an emergency episode regarding the nationwide push to defund the police, Dan explains why the news has become exhausting, the democrats wear kente garb on Capitol Hill in remembrance of George Floyd, Reebok and a host of brands cut ties with Crossfit, Dan Bilzerian gets blasted on social media in a poll he released to choose the name for his new book coming out soon, and the two ask fans live to elect their Drinkin’ Bro of the day.

ghostbed.com/drinkinbros
